channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: PA Board Of Ed Decision Is Latest Move In National Effort To Diminish Christian Education

item.title: Democratic Rep. Raul Grijalva, 77, dies after battle with lung cancer
item.description: Longtime Democratic Rep. Raul Grijalva has died at 77 after a "long brave battle" with lung cancer, his office announced in a statement Thursday.
